snippet: Challengers point to a shortage of Roman Catholic priests and to studies that show celibacy is a deterrent for young men wanting to enter the priesthood.
abstract: Support groups for women who have fallen in love with Roman Catholic priests and for priests themselves are proliferating online; challengers to clerical celibacy point to shortage of priests worldwide and to studies showing that celibacy is significant deterrent to men wanting to enter priesthood.
lead_paragraph: Challengers point to a shortage of Roman Catholic priests and to studies that show celibacy is a deterrent for young men wanting to enter the priesthood.

headline.main: In Love With a Priest: Support Groups Spread
headline.print_headline: In Love With a Priest: Support Groups Spread
